name: Heart Shape Black Forest Cake
details: Black forest cake is the perfect amalgamation of chocolate, whipped cream frosting and cherry liqueur garnished with fresh cherries. It looks decadent and tastes heavenly and that is all one needs for any sweet and joyous celebration.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , unsweetened cocoa powder , dark chocolate , baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Vegan Red Velvet Cup Cake
details: Red velvet cupcakes are traditionally made with a blend of cocoa powder, vinegar, and buttermilk, which creates a chemical reaction that helps give the cake a deep maroon color. However, today we typically enhance that hue with red food coloring to create vibrant cupcakes.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , white wine ,  liquid red food coloring , buttermilk ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Chocolate Fruit & Nut Cake
details: Fruitcake (or fruit cake or fruit bread) is a cake made with candied or dried fruit, nuts, and spices, and optionally soaked in spirits. In the United Kingdom, certain rich versions may be iced and decorated. Fruitcakes are typically served in celebration of weddings and Christmas.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , white wine , coarsely chopped nuts (walnuts, pecans, hazelnuts, almonds), dark chocolate , buttermilk ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Chocolate Vanilla Cake
details: Both vanilla and chocolate have a place in a healthy diet. If you're looking to eat more beneficial foods, chocolate does have a slight edge. It contains more beneficial nutrients and antioxidants than vanilla does and is generally consumed in larger amounts than vanilla
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar ,  dark chocolate , buttermilk ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Red Velvet Love Cake
details: Red velvet cupcakes are traditionally made with a blend of cocoa powder, vinegar, and buttermilk, which creates a chemical reaction that helps give the cake a deep maroon color. However, today we typically enhance that hue with red food coloring to create vibrant cupcakes.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , white wine ,  liquid red food coloring , buttermilk ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Chocolate Pinata Cake
details: Pinata chocolate cakes often have a firm chocolate shell on the outside. The exterior chocolate shell is usually shaped like a heart, sphere, or half-sphere. Sprinkles, fondant embellishments, ribbons, or icing are used to adorn the exterior chocolate shell.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar ,  dark chocolate , buttermilk ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Butter Scotch Cake
details: It's a classic buttercream made with butter, powdered sugar and some cream or milk, but it's got the addition of melted butterscotch chips
ingredients: All-purpose flour , brown sugar ,  dark chocolate , buttermilk , cornstarch , butterscotch chips  , butterscotch chips, baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Chocolate Truffle Pastry
details: A chocolate truffle is a type of chocolate confectionery, traditionally made with a chocolate ganache centre coated in chocolate, cocoa powder, coconut, or chopped and toasted nuts (typically hazelnuts or almonds), usually in a spherical, conical, or curved shape.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , unsweetened cocoa powder ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Strawberry Cake
details: Strawberry cake is a cake that uses strawberry as a primary ingredient. Strawberries may be used in the cake batter, atop the cake, and in the frosting. Strawberry cakes are typically served cold.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , strawberry,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Christmas Plum Cake
details: Fruitcake (or fruit cake or fruit bread) is a cake made with candied or dried fruit, nuts, and spices, and optionally soaked in spirits. In the United Kingdom, certain rich versions may be iced and decorated. Fruitcakes are typically served in celebration of weddings and Christmas.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , white wine , unsweetened cocoa powder ,  coarsely chopped nuts (walnuts, pecans, hazelnuts, almonds),,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , unsweetened cocoa powder , dark chocolate , baking powder, baking soda , milk , vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Divine Butterscotch Cake
details: It's a classic buttercream made with butter, powdered sugar and some cream or milk, but it's got the addition of melted butterscotch chips
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , butterscotch chips , unsweetened cocoa powder ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Red Velvet pastry
details: Red velvet cupcakes are traditionally made with a blend of cocoa powder, vinegar, and buttermilk, which creates a chemical reaction that helps give the cake a deep maroon color. However, today we typically enhance that hue with red food coloring to create vibrant cupcakes.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , unsweetened cocoa powder , liquid red food color,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Blueberry Puree Cake
details: Feel the lush exotic taste of blueberry in your mouth with a blast of cream.This blueberry layer cake has two layers of blueberry cake, a compote and a buttercream that bursts with blueberry flavor!
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , unsweetened cocoa powder , blueberries ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Chocolate Strawberry Layer Cake
details: Strawberry cake is a cake that uses strawberry as a primary ingredient. Strawberries may be used in the cake batter, atop the cake, and in the frosting. Strawberry cakes are typically served cold.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , strawberry , unsweetened cocoa powder ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: White Forest Cake
details: It is made of layers of chocolate cake soaked in some kind of Kirsch or cherry based syrup layered with cherries and cream and frosted with more cream and covered in chocolate decorations
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , strawberry , unsweetened cocoa powder ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Chocolate Berry Cake
details: This beauty is baked with a splash of Chambord and layered with a sweet raspberry filling, both of which offer bright counterpoints to the thick layer of chocolate-cream cheese frosting and whole berries scattered on top. You won't be able to have just one slice.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , fresh raspberries , unsweetened cocoa powder ,  baking powder, baking soda , milk , eggs ,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract

name: Red Velvet Cheese Cake - Eggless
details: Red velvet cupcakes are traditionally made with a blend of cocoa powder, vinegar, and buttermilk, which creates a chemical reaction that helps give the cake a deep maroon color. However, today we typically enhance that hue with red food coloring to create vibrant cupcakes.
ingredients: All-purpose flour , white sugar , unsweetened cocoa powder , liquid red food color , baking powder, baking soda , milk , milk cream,  vegetable oil , vanilla extract
